meta.content: Mount Anthony Union High School is located in Bennington, VT.

img.h1: Mount Anthony Union High School Home

div.div: Location: 1768 Hubbell Homestead at Colgate Park, 1357 West Rd, Bennington, VT 05201, USA
Our school is committed to excellence and achievement. It is our mission to provide a total quality education for every student.
We hope that your high school experience at Mount Anthony will be meaningful, productive and enjoyable.
